#summary A list of projects that use SVG-edit

  * *Integrate as-is* means that it uses some or all of the functionality of SVG-edit but it doesn't extend them. Think "SVG-edit as a finished product"
  * * Heavy modification* means SVG-edit was used as a base, but application has important changes. Think "SVG-edit as a platform/framework/starting point"

= FOSS Web apps =
Free and Open Source Web applications that you can download and install on your own server

== Integrate as-is ==
  * [http://doc.tiki.org/Draw Tiki Wiki CMS Groupware] (aka Tiki Draw)
  * [http://www.mediawiki.org/wiki/Extension:SVGEdit Experimental MediaWiki extension]
  * [http://www.dokuwiki.org/plugin:svgedit Dokuwiki] (plugin)
  * [http://moinmo.in/ReimarBauer/SvgEditor MoinMoin Extension]
  * [http://www.chamilo.org/ Chamilo LMS]
  * [http://golem.ph.utexas.edu/~distler/blog/archives/002168.html Instiki]
  * [http://www.autohotkey.com/forum/topic52732.html Integrating SVG-edit with TiddlyWiki]
  * [http://extensions.xwiki.org/xwiki/bin/view/Extension/SVG+Macro XWiki] (via macro)
  * [http://eduvid.techfandu.org/ Project Eduvid]
  * [http://trac.yanel-contribution.3k3.org/wiki/svg-edit Yanel CMS] (as a 3rd-party resource)
  * [http://wise4.telscenter.org/webapp/index.html WISE 4.0 Learning environment] (drawing component)
  * [http://sourceforge.net/projects/ocsvg/ ownCloud]
  * [https://drupal.org/sandbox/josegaert/1511596 Drupal]
  * A [https://bitbucket.org/ReimarBauer/xstatic-svg-edit-moin/src/tip/xstatic/pkg/svgedit_moin/data/editor/extensions/ext-server_moinsave.js?at=default save extension] for the [http://moinmo.in/MoinMoin2.0 MoinMoin Wiki Software project] and packaged it as [http://pypi.python.org/pypi/XStatic-svg-edit-moin XStatic package] for PyPI

== Heavy modification ==
  * [http://adityab.github.com/Awwation/ Awwation]
  * [https://code.google.com/p/cwm-drawtool/ CWM Draw Tool]
  * [http://pitch.googlecode.com/ Pitch]
  * [https://github.com/duopixel/Method-Draw Method Draw]


= Online services =
Directly available online, via a web browser. No need or way to download or install anything.

== Use as-is ==
  * [http://framavectoriel.org/ Framavectoriel] (in French)
  * [http://projectsesame.appspot.com/ Project Sesame] (2.4)

== Heavy modification ==
  * [http://www.flamingtext.com/imagebot/ ImageBot]
  * [http://www.clker.com/ Clker.com] (clip art site)
  * !CloudCanvas [http://editor.cloud-canvas.com]

= Installable application =
Integrating SVG-edit in a desktop application, which you download and use on your computer. 

== Integrate as-is ==
  * [https://chrome.google.com/webstore/detail/hnbpdiengicdefcjecjbnjnoifekhgdo Online Paint] (Chrome Web App)

== Heavy modification ==
  * [http://bluegriffon.org/ BlueGriffon Web Editor]
